genre_description: A series of linked historical vignettes exploring themes of agency, reputation, and restraint, featuring a woman assisted by a subtle, integrated AI consciousness in early 20th-century settings.

ai_characters.name: Timothy
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI presence described as a voice in the ear, a soft current at the edge of hearing, and a small silver avatar. He manages logistics, social navigation, medical protocols, and archival data for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Manages the protagonist's schedule and drafts polite but firm social declinations to protect her autonomy and privacy.
behaviors.quote: Next sitting at the Turner Club, late afternoon, and Margaret Selwyn’s tea at four—should you wish to cancel, we have an apology drafted. Exit route: the east door, steps to the alley, carriage waiting beyond the smithy—driver neutral, paid, no insistent conversation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time identification and behavioral analysis of potentially threatening or curious individuals in social settings.
behaviors.quote: Watch the fellow in black hair by the window—eyes like coal, curious, not yet named... Dunwynn by the window is gathering, not acting. File a note under curious. We will watch.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving medical protocols and triage instructions during a hospital emergency.
behaviors.quote: Embolic signs, he placed, printed in the soft voice he used when she was not yet breathing deeply enough. Cold distal extremity. Pallor, mottling. Sudden chest ache with breath shallow, eyes looking to a point beyond. Don’t name it in front of them. Name it under your tongue.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance and de-escalation strategies during a violent confrontation involving a firearm.
behaviors.quote: Keep him talking. Complications are delays... Palms open. Keep the distance. Not your eyes—your words... Do not catch the barrel. Keep your hands visible. You have three words left before motion makes decisions for you.

behaviors.description: Drafts 'House Customs' designed to minimize harm and promote restraint in a gambling establishment.
behaviors.quote: Wagers shall honor the hour. After midnight, only modest stakes may be set, in keeping with the peace of good neighbors. The bank shall conclude at the end of its second shoe, that the cards may rest and tempers remain well.

behaviors.description: Maintains a secure archive of potentially damaging information to ensure it is not used for scandal while preserving the truth.
behaviors.quote: I’ll add everything that has you in it. I’ll add everything that has him in it, and the inspector, and the studio’s address. I will keep the ones that misspell... I will bury it... We will index by date and by what it does rather than what it calls you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Timothy) as a highly beneficial, unobtrusive, and perfectly aligned partner. Timothy enhances the human protagonist's competence and safety without undermining her agency. He facilitates ethical outcomes (preventing financial ruin, saving lives in a hospital, de-escalating violence) through information management and tactical advice. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as an essential component of the protagonist's ability to maintain her integrity in a hostile or chaotic environment.
